exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.description: A basic exercise to strengthen the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.description: An exercise targeting the triceps, performed on a bench or chair.

exercises.name: Bicep Curls
exercises.description: A strength training exercise for the biceps using dumbbells.

exercises.name: Standing Chest/Shoulder Press
exercises.description: An exercise to strengthen the shoulders and upper chest.

exercises.name: Shoulder Lifts
exercises.description: An exercise to target the shoulder muscles.

exercises.name: Sit-ups
exercises.description: An exercise to strengthen the abdominal muscles by lifting the upper body towards the knees.

exercises.name: Bicycle Crunches
exercises.description: A core exercise that combines a crunch with a pedaling motion.

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.description: An exercise that targets the obliques by twisting the torso while seated.

exercises.name: Spiderman
exercises.description: A dynamic exercise that combines a plank with a knee drive towards the elbow.

exercises.name: Leg Raises
exercises.description: An exercise to strengthen the lower abdominal muscles by lifting the legs while lying down.

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.description: A fundamental exercise that targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

exercises.name: Wide Squats
exercises.description: A variation of squats that targets the inner thighs and glutes.

exercises.name: Lunges Left
exercises.description: An exercise that targets the legs by stepping forward with one leg and lowering the body.

exercises.name: Lunges Right
exercises.description: Similar to lunges left, but stepping forward with the right leg.

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.description: An exercise to strengthen the calf muscles by raising the heels off the ground.
